ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T01:57:08 [Issue ID 4000-113881] urn:comicvine:4000-113881 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 14:27:38. [Issue ID 52694]
ComicInfo.Summary: Battle Tide Part 4: The demonic Battletide has washed over the combat world of Colosseum and earth's heroes watch in horror as Termagent and Megaira absorb the power of the wave and combine to form the demon lord Termagaira. The heroes battle this new threat but it is Death's Head, modified by Killpower, who is able to absorb the Battletide and save the day. The heroes return to earth where Killpower reassembles Death's Head as good as new (well, almost).
ComicInfo.Title: Battle Tide Part 4
